alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe; Denver; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 5:22PM MDT until June 06 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Western Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Denver County in northeastern Colorado... Western Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 521 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Fort Lupton to 5 miles southwest of Arapahoe Park, or along a line extending from 24 miles south of Greeley to 13 miles southeast of Denver, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Denver, Aurora, northeastern Centennial, northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Fort Lupton, Lochbuie, Hudson, Buckley SFB and Arapahoe Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
